Posts.Content: fairygurl7 wrote: I am scheduled for a double mastectomy this Friday. I threw my back out yesterday and I'm in terrible pain. I was wondering if it was safe to take Vicodin before my surgery? All the paperwork I read said not to take Tylenol and herbals. Please tell me if it would be ok to take it. I don't want to put my surgery at risk but I'm in horrible pain. Thanks!Â  Dx 8/18/2008, DCIS, 1cm, Stage 0, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Not sure... fairygurl7 bluedasher
